EXPIRED_TOKEN: Operation failed (link probably expired). Please, try to perform the action once again.
INVALID_INPUT_DATA: Invalid inputs passed. Please, check your data.
INVALID_CREDENTIALS: Invalid credentials. Could not log in.
SERVER_ERROR: Something went wrong during processing the request. Please, try again later.
USER_ALREADY_EXISTS: User with provided email already exists.
USER_DOESNT_EXIST: User with provided data doesn't exists
